title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      We accept reservations for school visits throughout the year:   Consider bringing your students to the park in the fall/springtime   or for a snowshoe walk (SnowSchool) in winter.   Information about field trips in each season are available from the links on this page. Each field trip page includes suggested itineraries/field trip guides and links to recommended lesson plans to prepare your students for a visit to the park and to continue the educational experience back in the classroom.
